Summary: Taking pics of sun setting in L.A. (approx. 4:30 - 5pm) and noticed object after uploading to laptop
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around December 13th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking on Mayview Drive (2100 block) in Los Feliz on December 13, 2010 and took two pictures (using my cell phone camera) of the sun setting to the west over Los Angeles. I am guessing it was approximately 4:30 to 5pm. I did not notice the object in the sky until after uploading the cell phone pictures to my laptop. The two photos I've submitted were taken approximately 5 to 10 seconds apart.
